pronotum.comment: Beige with 6 black spots (VV pattern)  or up to nine spots with anterior pair and middle spot small.

IT.comment_EN: The species is present only in brackish lagoons of Veneto and Emilia Romagna (Northern Italy)
IT.comment: La specie è presente solo in lagune salmastre del Veneto e dell'Emilia Romagna (Italia settentrionale)

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment: Yellow-brown, with white lateral and fore margin feebly cut around head, transparent, partially covering eyes.

CZ.comment_EN: In CR moderately common on trees. Somewhat similar to Halyzia sedecimguttata - check number of spots!
CZ.comment: V České republice poměrně hojný na stromech, Možno zaměny se slunéčkem 16tečným, Halyzia sedecimguttata. Pro jistotu spočítat tečky vícekrát.

IT.comment_EN: The species is not present in Sardinia or Sicily
IT.comment: La specie non è presente nelle Isole

PT.comment_EN: Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment:
Yellow-brown, with white patches at
fore and hind angles, sometimes with a white patch behind at the centre

food: Immature stages of chrysomelids and psocopterans

IT.comment_EN: The species is not present in Sardinia
IT.comment: La specie non è presente in Sardegna

PT.comment_EN: Species present at low abundance. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Espécies pouco abundante. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

pronotum.comment: Black, anterior angles with small white area

leg: Black, fore and mid tibiae brown at tip.

IT.comment_EN: The species frequents alpine meadows. The subspecies C.a.alpina is from Central and Western Alps, while the subsp. Redtenbacheri from Eastern Alps.
IT.comment: La specie frequenta i pascoli alpini. La sottospecie C. a. alpina e presente nelle Alpi occidentali e centrali, mentre la sottospecie C. a. redtenbacheri nelle Alpi orientali

pronotum.comment: Black, anterior angles and margins widely white, border between the two colours with four deep lobes

leg: Black, fore tibiae brown inside and at tip.

comment: Wet and shaded stands on herbs
Wet and shaded stands on herbs
Wet and shaded stands on herbs

IT.comment_EN: The species is present only in Northern Italy, in alpine ecosystems between 800-1700 meters a.s.l.
IT.comment: La specie è presente solo nell'Italia Settentrionale, in ecosistemi alpini tra 800–1700 metri s.l.m

comment: Wet and shaded stands on herbs

PT.comment_EN: Species present at low abundance. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Espécies pouco abundante. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment: Black, anterior angles widely white, fore margin in males white

leg: Femora black, fore tibiae brown with black outer margin, mid and hind tibiae black with brown tips

CZ.comment_EN: Development on herbaceous stands in warm lowland areas. Forms conspicuous hibernation aggregations on hilltops. Similar to Coccinella septempunctata, may be distinguished by pear-shaped form of central spot in front of elytrae (rounded in C. septempunctata)
CZ.comment: Vývoj na bylinnách v teplých nížinách. Vytvářejí nápadné formace agregací na vrcholcích vršků. Podobné slunéčku sedmitečnému, mohou být rozlišeny na základě hruškovitého tvaru centrální tečky v přední části krovek   (u slunéčka sedmitečného okrouhlé)

overwintering: under stones and grass tussocks, buildings
IT.comment_EN: It forms conspicuous hibernation aggregations on hilltops but it overwinters also in buildings
IT.comment: Forma rilevanti aggregazioni di individui svernanti sulla sommità di monti. Sverna anche in ricoveri, quali comignoli e sottotetti di abitazioni

PT.comment_EN: Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores (despite it has already been  recorded at S. Miguel island) and Madeira.
PT.comment: Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores (apesar de já ter sido referida para a ilha de S. Miguel) e da Madeira.

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment: Black with large white trapeziodal patches on anterior angle
Posteriorly black, anterior margin and angles pale, border between colours wavy or four-lobed

leg:
Forelegs mostly
yellow-brown, middle legs partially, hind legs mostly black

overwintering: On the ground in dry plants
On the ground in dry plants
CZ.comment: Viděn na květenství rostlin čeledi Asteraceae, pravděpodobně se živí pylem

IT.comment_EN: The species is common in Central Italy
IT.comment: Specie comune nell'Italia Centrale

PT.comment_EN: There is no updated information on their habitats in Portugal. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Não há nformação atualizada sobre os seus habitats.  Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

pronotum.comment: Black with white anterior and lateral margins

plant: Various grasses and low growing plants
Various grasses and low growing plants
Various grasses and low growing plants

pronotum.comment: Brown with black spot at centre, rarely with other black markings.

leg: Yellow-brown with black spots on tibiae

CZ.comment_EN: Without spots in Central Europe, with spots southerly
CZ.comment: Bez teček ve střední Evropě, s tečkami na jihu

IT.comment_EN: The species is present only in Central-Northern Italy
IT.comment: Specie presente solo nell'Italia Centro Settentrionale.

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment: Black with wide yellow-orange lateral margins

IT.comment_EN: Not present in Sardinia
IT.comment: Non è presente in Sardegna

CZ.comment_EN: Wing cases covered in short hairs. Prefers warm south.
CZ.comment: Krovky pokryté krátkými chloupky. Preferují teplý jih.

IT.comment_EN: The species lives on plants belonging to Cucurbitaceae family
IT.comment: La specie vive sulle piante della famiglia delle Cucurbitaceae.

PT.comment_EN: Observed in potato. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Observado em batateira. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

pronotum.comment: Black, anterior and lateral margins with equally wide white stripe, border between the two colours slightly wavy

CZ.comment_EN: In CR rare, in warm areas, also on lucerne
CZ.comment: V ČR vzácný, v teplých oblastech, i na vojtěšce

pronotum.comment: White to beige with seven black spots

overwintering: Under the bark of solitary tree
Under the bark of solitary tree
CZ.comment_EN: Migrates to solitary trees for overwintering in late September.
CZ.comment: Na konci září migruje na solitérní stromy k přezimování.

overwintering: Under the bark of solitary tree
Under the bark of solitary tree
PT.comment_EN: Species common throughout the continental territory. Colected in citrus and plum trees infested with aphids and Poplar. Rare on herbs. From north to south Portugal. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Espécie comum em todo o território continental. Encontra-se citrinos e ameixeiras infestadas de afídeos assim como em Choupos.  Rara em herbáceas. Presente em todo o território continental. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

overwintering: Buildings, gardens, under the bark of trees

filter: with white patch on each side

IT.comment_EN: Its distribution is limited to Pianura Padana (Northern Italy)
IT.comment: La sua distribuzione è confinata alla Pianura Padana (Italia settentrionale)

pronotum.comment: Black with large white fore angles and middle white band

IT.comment_EN: The subspecies O.l. lyncea is present in the west Mediterranean region, while the subsp. Agnatha in the east. O. lyncea lives on evergreen and cork oaks, while subsp. Agnatha on deciduous oaks. It's not present in Sardinia
IT.comment: La sottospecie O. lyncea lyncea è a presente nell'area del Mediterraneo occidentale, mentre la sottospecie agnatha in quella orientale. O. l. lyncea vive sulle querce sempreverdi (sughera e leccio) mentre O. l. agnatha sulle querce decidue. Non è presente in Sardegna.

PT.comment_EN: Recorded on  holm  and cork oaks. From north to south Portugal. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Observada em azinheiras e sobreiros. Presente em todo o território continental. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

pronotum.comment: Dark with wide white lateral margins, strongly arched in the shape of the letter C

pattern: White (mainly in rusty individuals) or lemon yellow (in black individuals)

CZ.comment_EN: Colour changes from brown-and-white to black-and-yellow at the end of overwintering.
CZ.comment: Na konci přezimování změní zbarvení z hnědé a bílé do černé a žluté.

PT.comment_EN: There is no updated information on their habitats. Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Não há nformação atualizada sobre os seus habitats. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

common_name.FR: Coccinelle à 20 points, Coccinelle de l'aune

filter: with white patch on each side
pronotum.comment: Brown-orange, transparent with opaque white patches

PT.comment_EN: Non-abundant arboreal species. Collected in Quercus robur and Cupressus lusitanicus.Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Espécie arborícola pouco abundante. Colhida em Quercus robur e Cupressus lusitanicus. Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

common_name.FR: Petite coccinelle orange, Coccinelle à 12 points

BE.comment_EN: Extreme thermophilous species from calcareous grasslands, mine terrils, dune habitats etc. in Belgium but it does occur on trees indeed

IT.comment_EN: Species introduced as biological control agent, it is found on spindle (genus Euonymus) in Central Italy
IT.comment: Specie introdotta per controllo biologico, si rinviene sull'evonimo (genere Euonymus)  nell'Italia Centrale

comment: Herbage and shrub layers on well drained soils

IT.comment_EN: Italian endemism of coastal pine woodlands. It is not present in Sardinia
IT.comment: Endemismo italiano delle pinete del litorale tirrenico. Non è presente in Sardegna

filter: with white patch on each side

IT.comment_EN: The species lives in alpine grasslands, 2000 meters a.s.l.. The subspecies C. v. venusta is present in Alpi Marittime and Cozie (Northern Italy) and in Monti della Laga (Southern Italy). The subspecies C. v. adalioides, on the contrary, is present in the Alpi Graie and Pennine (Northern Italy)
IT.comment: La specie vive in praterie montane sopra i 2000 metri. La sottospecie C. v. venusta è presente nell'Italia settentrionale nelle Alpi Marittime e Cozie, mentre nell'Italia meridionale sui Monti della Laga. La sottospecie C. v. adalioides è invece presente al nord, nelle Alpi Graie e Pennine

filter: with white patch on each side

IT.comment_EN: Boreo-Alpine species, it is limited to upper Valtellina (Northern Italy)
IT.comment: Specie boreo-alpina, ha distribuzione limitata alla sola alta Valtellina

pattern: None or dark oblique line posteriorly

comment: Herbage and shrub layers on well drained soils

IT.comment_EN: With an extremely reduced distribution, the species is present only in Lampedusa Isle (Sicily)
IT.comment: A distribuzione estremamente ridotta, la specie è presente solo nell'isola di Lampedusa (Sicilia)

pronotum.comment: Black with wide yellow-orange lateral margins

leg: Black, fore and mid tibiae brown at tip.

IT.comment_EN: Mountain species, present in Central-Northern Italy with two subspecies. C.r. rufocincta is present in the Alpi Marittime, Cozie and in the Appennino Tosco-Emiliano, while the subspecies C.r.doderoi from Alpi Graie to Alpi Retiche
IT.comment: Specie montana, è presente in Italia Centro Settentrionale con due sottospecie. La sottospecie C. r. rufocincta è presente nelle Alpi Marittime, Cozie e nell'Appennino Tosco-Emiliano, mentre la sottospecie C. r. doderoi nelle Alpi dalle Graie alle Retiche

comment: Herbage and shrub layers on well drained soils

IT.comment_EN: The species lives on tamarisks (plants of the genus Tamarix)
IT.comment: La specie vive sulle tamerici (piante del genere Tamarix)

comment: Herbage and shrub layers on well drained soils

PT.comment_EN: Not present in the Archipelagos of the Azores and Madeira.
PT.comment: Não está presente nos Arquipélagos dos Açores e da Madeira.

IT.comment_EN: The species is present only in Sicily
IT.comment: La specie è presente solo in Sicilia
